operations.summary: Assign Tenant Circles to an AOS Version Box
operations.notes: Assign a list of Tenant Circles to an AOS Version Box by a given ID

parameters.name: aosVersionBoxId
parameters.description: ID of AOS Version to be updated
Tenant Circle IDs

operations.summary: List all TenantCircles for a Version Box

parameters.name: aosVersionBoxId
parameters.description: ID of AOS Version Box to find

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The start index of the return list, default as 0

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The size of the return list, default as 50

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: The property by which the returned list is sorted, default as 'name'

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: Sort order, default as 'desc'

parameters.name: aosVersionBoxId
parameters.description: ID of AOS Version Box that needs to be deleted
